column4: how do I disable those obnoxious notification bubbles that appear every time you get a message in Pidgin or Empathy and the window isn't focused?
those bubbles persist like 5 seconds and there's no easy way to close them
I very much resent this form of desktop behavior
i think notification-daemon is in charge of that
why is it that GNOME's UI designers (and KDE's) have gotten so obnoxious over the past few years? :-p
actually most recent OS releases have UIs that piss me off
Windows 7 is very much on my shitlist though
now the other question I have - is there a command line tool to set the ip address etc similiar to service network restart?
edit the file /etc/network/interfaces and restart the networking service, but interfaces configured in there won't work in network-manager anymore
in general that's a good thing
